Articles.Content:
![kerbalstellar_by_link3r-d8pz1up.jpg](http://img14.deviantart.net/ebc3/i/2015/106/6/e/kerbalstellar_by_link3r-d8pz1up.jpg)

I... I have been meaning to make that joke since I saw the movie. 

And I don't know about you guys but I really want to try the Endurance spin-docking while falling through the stratosphere as well.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T03:19:00Z" title="04/17/2015 03:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by Sovnheim**
Nice job with the art! Looks great. On regards to the endurance, I agree. It was the first thing I thought of when I watched that sceene.

There's a mod for that.

And it should be Cristopher Kerman.

> 
> There's a mod for that.
> And it should be Cristopher Kerman.

\*Christopher
